mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (card_number, expiration_date, cvc, card_password, created_at, card_product_id, member_id, is_valid) VALUES (#{cardNumber}, #{expirationDate}, #{cvc}, #{cardPassword}, #{createdAt}, #{cardProductId}, #{memberId}, #{isValid})
mapper.select: SELECT c.id AS cardId, IFNULL(c.custom_image_url, cp.card_image_url) AS cardImageUrl, cp.card_product_name AS cardProductName, o.organization_name AS bankName, m.name AS memberName, c.is_valid AS isValid FROM card c JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id JOIN organization o ON cp.organization_code = o.organization_code JOIN member m ON c.member_id = m.id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT cp.card_product_name AS cardProductName, o.organization_name AS bankName FROM card c JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id JOIN organization o ON cp.organization_code = o.organization_code WHERE c.id = #{cardId}

SELECT benefit_category AS benefitCategory, store_name AS storeName, discount_rate AS discountRate, description AS description FROM card_benefit WHERE card_product_id = ( SELECT card_product_id FROM card WHERE id = #{cardId} )
SELECT id, card_product_id, rate_value, benefit_type, store_name, description FROM store_benefit WHERE id = #{cardId}
SELECT card_product_id FROM card WHERE id = #{userCardId} AND is_valid = 1
SELECT DISTINCT card_product_id FROM card WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND is_valid = 1

SELECT id, card_number AS cardNumber, expiration_date AS expirationDate, cvc, card_password AS cardPassword, created_at AS createdAt, custom_image_url AS customImageUrl, card_product_id AS cardProductId, member_id AS memberId, is_valid AS isValid FROM card WHERE id = #{cardId}

SELECT c.id, c.card_number AS cardNumber, cp.card_product_name AS cardProductName, cp.card_image_url AS cardImageUrl FROM card c JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id WHERE c.member_id = #{memberId} AND c.is_valid = 1

SELECT c.id, c.card_number, c.custom_image_url, cp.id AS card_product_id, o.organization_code, o.organization_name, cp.card_product_name, cp.card_image_url, cp.required_monthly_spent, sb.store_name, sb.store_category, sb.benefit_type, sb.value_type, sb.rate_value, sb.amount_value, sb.description FROM member m LEFT JOIN card c ON m.id = c.member_id LEFT JOIN card_product cp ON c.card_product_id = cp.id LEFT JOIN store_benefit sb ON cp.id = sb.card_product_id LEFT JOIN organization o ON o.organization_code = cp.organization_code WHERE m.id = #{memberId}
